content:
According to what @Tim Abbott said in issue streams should disappear from 'All stream' view after guest user unsubscribes it but then 'Subscribed' tab and 'All stream' tab look identical.
Therefore is it necessary to keep 'All stream' tab for guest user or should I solve this problem differently?
good observation! Yeah, I think we should remove the "All streams" tab for guests.
@Rishi Gupta do you think remove, or just mark as unavailable like we do with settings? I'm not sure how the UI would look with only one tab.
I'm imagining removing the tab selector as well, but making unavailable is also a reasonable solution
I guess if we removed it entirely, the page wouldn't look too weird.
